page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: {Type of Farm:}Most of the farms in the area are a mixture of arable and livestock. The large proportion of pasture land is usually included as part of the crop rotation. { {Chemical Treatment:}All farms use herbicides, fungicides and pesticides except Stanbridge which does not use pesticides. Weston and Bolinge Hill Farms suffer from slug damage which is increasing in spite of treatment and may be the result of a natural predator being killed by chemicals. {Housing:}All farm workers live in farm accommodation. {Landlords:}Apart from Bolinge Hill Farm and Jacobs Yard the land is partly or wholly owned by Trinity College, Cambridge.
